Retrieve bbox from a spatial file

Source: R/bbox_from_file.R
bbox_from_file.Rd

Helper function used to retrieve the bounding box of a specified spatial file recognized by GDAL or OGG: the function reads the extent using gdalinfo or ogrinfo, converting it to a specified CRS.

bbox_from_file(file_path, crs_out)

Arguments

file_path

string path of a spatial file.
crs_out

string proj4string of the desired output projection.

Note

License: GPL 3.0
